title: 6/15/17 - Who Is To Blame For The DC Shooting? (Rep. Barry Loudermilk Joins Glenn)
description:
Who is to blame for the DC shooting? ...This is a rewriting of American history ...The media is already back to their old ways ...Bernie Sanders condemns the DC shooting ...US Rep. Barry Loudermilk of Georgia describes his harrowing ordeal at the Alexandria, VA baseball park ...'God was there' ...Deadlocked jury at the trial of Bill Cosby.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
